summary: This document is a summary of monthly charges for an AT&T Wireless account, detailing billing information, charges, payments, and usage for the account number 0035224228. It includes specific charges for services, taxes, and a breakdown of voice usage, as well as information on recurring electronic fund transfers. This document details the voice usage, data usage, and text message activity for the phone number (561) 308-0282, associated with various incoming and outgoing calls, including timestamps and charges. It provides insights into the communication patterns related to the number, which is relevant to the Epstein case.
